text: Gei au ga daa gi daha dogu duu nnoo huaidina dela nogo i dogu huaidina, ga helekai, “Deenei di hai a God gaa hai gi tei dangada i goodou dela hagalee hagagila dana hagababa. God ga daa gi daha godou hale mo nia mee huogodoo ala e hai mee ginai goodou, hagalee dumaalia adu gi goodou e hai mee gi dahi mee.”
